file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-24-01-02 - PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to discard the portable fire extinguishers. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - DIS- ALL 26-24-01-960-801-A ♦ CARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-24-01 Page 1 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-24-01-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - DISCARD A. General (1) To discard the portable fire extinguisher, obey these instructions. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 26-24-01-000-802-A/400 PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 26-24-01-400-802-A/400 PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Mission crew cabin and cockpit I. Portable Fire Extinguisher Bottle - Discard SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the portable fire extinguisher and send it to the manufacturer's facilities or to an authorized workshop (AMM TASK 26-24-01-000-802-A/400). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install a new portable-fire-extinguisher (AMM TASK 26-24-01-400-802-A/400).
